DOC.brief_summary: The objective study describe intraocular pressure-lowering efficacy AL-3789 24-hour period patient open-angle glaucoma compare untreated control . Patients receive one treatment AL-3789 . Twenty-eight day treatment , IOP measure every 4 hour , begin 8 AM 24 hour .
